title: Willamette Pool House / Fieldwork Design and Architecture
description: The Willamette Pool House is perched on a bluff above the Willamette River in Newberg, Oregon, offering sweeping views extending up and down the river. Positioned west of the property's main house, this outbuilding supports the new pool and spa with a lounge, kitchenette, changing room, steam shower, bathroom, and pool equipment room. Stacking floor-to-ceiling sliding doors seamlessly extend the interior space to a covered patio that features an outdoor dining area and kitchen.
author: Valeria Silva

title: Capim Cidró House / Angela Castilho Arquitetura e Interiores
description: Capim Cidró House was designed as a retreat to slow down and reconnect with the essence of simple living. Located in Alto Paraíso de Goiás, the residence reflects the Wabi-Sabi style, emphasizing simplicity and authenticity through natural elements and a neutral color palette. This essential approach is enriched by contemporary touches, such as automation technologies and finishes that balance rusticity and sophistication.
author: Pilar Caballero

title: CLB Architects converts former Kmart building into manufacturing facility

description: International studios Morq, GOMA Taller, Studio Andrew Trotter and Taller Hector Barroso have been selected to design Pala Zion, a series of luxury residences in the Utah desert. title: A New Restaurant Design Inspired By The Food It Sells – The Waffle
description: Multidisciplinary design studio Masquespacio has shared photos of their latest project, Novu Waffle, an innovative gastronomic space in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia. With a focus on fun and immersion, Masquespacio has created a dynamic and cheerful environment where the waffle is the undisputed star.
